author: Garret Glascock
comment: You would figure that if you paid for an app that there would be a companion app installed on your phone to at least give you the illusion that you have some control over the the settings of said app. But the developers apparently figured that they were smarter than me and I am at their mercy. Being some who usually NEVER pays for apps, I am genuinely disappointed.
title: Its okay

comment: Please add an option to display the date. It looks Esther bad the way it just jumps from one minion to another most of the time when coming from the black and white ambient mode. The change needs to be animated so it's not so jarring or change it only once per hour or something.
title: Date and transitions

author: Stephen Carter
comment: Installed with no problem on Sony Smartwatch 3.  Sorry can't help with install as it was just there after about 30 to 40 seconds, I know some times you need to disconnect your watch and re connect it to get things to work; have had to do this on other apps . If it had the date and steps would give it 5. Perhaps a new update soon with more minions?? Please
title: It's good

author: Richard Baljeu
comment: It looks nice and the animations are cool. But there's nothing you can customize. And the time is placed at roughly the same spot as where "OK Google" appears (on a round watch). Which makes it difficult to see the time.
title: Looks nice but no customization

author: Andy Hong
comment: The animations are great. The numerals for time, although quite small, are still legible both in awake and ambient modes. Minions turn into line drawings in ambient mode to save battery.   I wish it showed the date!
title: Puts a smile on my face. Works great on Samsung Gear Live.

author: Sharon Mehl
comment: Love having the Minions on my Moto 360. It''s just a tad ever so slightly laggy but I bet it will be fixed in the next update. Hoping to see the developers release even more of these guys. Favorite is the coffee hyped minion!
title: Moody Minions so fun!

author: Davinder Kundi
comment: Firstly i think its a bit unfair people rating it one star simply because they couldnt install it/find it. No issues here.  Love the screen off and on modes, animations are great, too.  They can be a little repetitive and it would be great to see some new ones added, for this reason and the price i think 4 stars is perfectly reasonable!

author: Chris Alberts
comment: I've installed, Uninstalled, restarted phone AND watch several times and it doesn't load on my LG G watch R. After Uninstalling and reinstalling several times, it finally showed up.
title: Doesn't show up

author: Ryan Peterman
comment: Installed twice on moto x and I have the moto 360. Cannot find the watch face anywhere even after restarting my watch. Not appearing on the watch, on the android wear app, or the moto connect app for me to select.... Help!
title: Can't find once installed

comment: I have been trying to find on my Samsung gear and phone for a month, contacted developer twice for help and they never reply! Save your money!!!
title: Rip off!

author: Jeremy Soo
comment: But it makes my Huawei Watch rally laggy for some reason?  No other watch face makes my watch lag but this one does...
title: One of my favourites!

author: Tom Mane
comment: Great watch face with funny animations! Always brought a smile to my face! And please people, any complaints from Samsung Gear S users, please DO READ that this watchface is for ANDROID WEAR not TIZEN
title: Great for Minion fans!

author: Reddappa Reddy
comment: The watch face looks great and i really love those little animations of the minions in my watch. I feel time position is little bit awkward. Could you please rearrange time position in the watch. Until then 4 stars for the app. If possible please add more minions 😂
title: Great watchface but..

author: Matt Greene
comment: I have restarted my watch twice and my phone once. I have also tried to re-sync apps on my watch multiple times. It still isn't showing up. Will adjust rating if I can get it to show up. I'm using an LG G Watch on 5.1.1.                                                                      EDIT: I really like the look. Would give it 5 stars if date and battery indicator were added. Please add!
title: Not showing up EDIT: showed up finally

author: Glenn Smith
comment: I had to uninstall and re-install in order to get it to show up.  I also thought there was a way to configure some options - I guess not.  Good for what it is.  I do wish there were some options such as animation times, how often to change minions, maybe some weather.

author: C.S. Rhymes
comment: I'm not sure who likes this more, me or the kids. Both the active and power save modes are cool and easy to read the time on my Sony smartwatch 3.
title: Great watch face

author: Amar-Singh HSS
comment: Like it, great for children at work but needs a date and battery meter. And for Moto 360 tends to obscure part if face. Possible to push time to the side?
title: Good but

author: Keon Parsa
comment: Maybe you could add some settings like how often it changes, or if you want to stay on one minion. Great start!   a seconds indicator would also be greatly appreciated.  Also, the date would be great.
title: Amazingly cute and likable.

author: Matthew Barnard
comment: Would love to see more graphics. Also the minions don't move when the screen turns on, that would be nice. They only turn on if I enter and exit a menu
title: Great but...

comment: A Google store person said I needed Android Wear on my Verizon Samsung G2 to use this watch face. Getting Android Wear to work was a NightMare which, among other things, required chats, emails & a factory reset of my watch. After All That the watch face still doesn't show up - and, I have to un/re-install everything I had before this started. I'm sure it's really great.  I love Minions & would love to be able to use it. Developers: if you're out there: Help Me
title: Installation is the problem

author: Adam Lasnik
comment: Sure, it may not have lasting value (er, I might get sick of it after a while), but for a 99 cent investment, I've gotten well enough smiles from it already :).
title: Pretty darn adorable!

author: tressa robinson
comment: So for those of you who are able to get it to work, how about a lil input on how you did it.  I also can not get it to work on my gear.  If you have the answers.. please share!
title: Mine either

author: Shireen Walker
comment: Have downloaded,  not on my gear s,  have refunded and Re downloaded and still no where,  have Re started phone and watch.  Absolutely crap,  don't waste your time and pence
title: Crap

author: yash sureka
comment: Its nowhere, the developer is a fraud !!! My watch runs 5.1.1 and I downloaded the watch face yesterday and its not showing in the watch and even in the android wear app. I have restarted my watch and phone several times and also factory resetted the watch but its not syncing. I have written 2 emails already and no replies. If this goes on , I will register a case on the developer of fraud. Terribly disappointed !

author: Juan Solano
comment: Kids love it. The minions should always be animated and not static when the watch face turns on. The animations make this a great watch face not the pictures of a minion.
title: Cool

author: rod lever
comment: This app brightens up my day ever time I look at my watch.
title: Minions on my phone

author: Sandy P
comment: Lots of adorable minions, doing cute things. I do wish we could see the date too though. Otherwise this is a great face.
title: Too cute!

author: Christopher Kulitis
comment: After both resyncing apps to watch, and rebooting phone and watch and then resyncing apps the watch face still does not show, at least the refund was easy enough to get.
title: Wish it worked.

author: Mark Orsted
comment: Can't see this at all and is not available to add to my watch.   I waited past the refund point so I guess yolks on me.
title: Moto360

author: Ludovico Gardenghi
comment: I would keep this as my default watch face if I could set it to 24 hour format and if the date (at least day and day of the week) was visible somewhere.
title: Nice, but only 12 hour format and no date.

author: Emeka F.E
comment: Add 24 hour format and date. It should be a no brainer
title: Developer is late to fix issues

author: Dustin Mach
comment: I love the idea for this app! I work with kids and they love to see my watch and I'd love to have this with the kids. But I have the gear S and can't get this. Make gear A compatible please!! Then 5 stars!
title: Gear S compatibility

author: Angelo Rohit
comment: Delightful watch face. Works great on my Moto360  running Android OS 5.1.1. The ambient watch face is also nicely done. I wish the face had more features such as displaying the watch battery level. Worth the money spent.

author: - DzBrio
comment: Its good! You guys that can't find it, check ur Android wear app, that's where I found mine. Then set it as ur watch face
title: Minions

author: Alex Mik
comment: Can't find it once installed. Tried twice. Moto 360 5.01
title: Where is it?

author: Marilyn Coleman-Miles
comment: Can't find the app on my Samsung Gear 2 SM-R732.
title: Unimpressed

author: Graham Ferguson
comment: I can't work out how to get it on to my Samsung gear watch.
title: Can't get it on to my Samsung gear watch

author: Tre Eyden
comment: Updated to 5.0.1 and it didn't show up in watch faces. Restated my watch and there it was. Great watch face!
title: Try restarting your watch

author: Phillip Malone
comment: Minions on my wrist! What more can I say!
title: Love it!

author: daniel meehan
comment: It's just a really fun clock. It would be really cool if they add even more animations and some customization. I love it though. It's worth it!
title: My moto 360 is fun!!
